# SiriTipViewStyle

**Structure**

The styles to apply to the tip views you use to display spoken phrases.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SiriTipViewStyle
```

## Overview

Specify a [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/SiriTipViewStyle] value when you add a [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/SiriTipUIView] or [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/SiriTipView] type to your interface. For the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/SiriTipView] type, specify the style using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/siriTipViewStyle(_:)] modifier.

## Getting the styles

- **automatic**
- **dark**
- **light**

## Tip views

- **SiriTipUIView**: A view that displays the phrase a person uses to invoke an App Shortcut.
- **SiriTipView**: A SwiftUI view that displays the phrase someone uses to invoke an App Shortcut.
